You can visit our website:            https://www.altsextension.com

Alt+S Extension: Searching google queries shorter and faster than before

Let's take for example your first queries with "Python":
Might look something like
*              "foreach python"
*              "init array inline python"
*              "cast int to string python"
We can easily see that many of our queries include "Python"
But do you need to type "Python" again every time? 

Here is where the extension is very effective
A Keyword will be added automatically to your google query 

Go to 'Tips': The Extension can be easily accessed by clicking "Alt + S" shortcut.
*Note: Queries will open in a new tab
